member.name: WS_OPAQUE_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL
member.summary: Type for supplying a Windows Integrated Authentication credential as an opaque handle created by SspiPromptForCredentials and the related family of APIs. This feature is available only on Windows 7 and later.

member.name: WS_OPAQUE_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.credential
member.summary: The base type from which this type and all other Windows Integrated Authentication credential types derive.

member.name: WS_OPAQUE_WINDOWS_INTEGRATED_AUTH_CREDENTIAL.opaqueAuthIdentity
member.summary: The opaque form of authentication identity. The supplied value must be of the type PSEC_WINNT_AUTH_IDENTITY_OPAQUE.
